title: Presumed Innocent
description: Rusty Sabich is a deputy prosecutor engaged in an obsessive affair with a coworker who is murdered. Soon after, he's accused of the crime. And his fight to clear his name becomes a whirlpool of lies and hidden passions.

reviews.text: +Fantastic cast+Great cinematography+Memorable Soundtrack from John Williams+Interesting legal/political setting-Dialogue felt stilted at timesAn entertaining movie particularly for fans of the courtroom drama type of setting. The screenplay felt a bit off and in some areas felt unnatural. Excellent cinematography, cast and soundtrack keep things moving along at an even pace. Overall a well made and entertaining film.
